reviews.review_msg: extremely tough grader, dont take his course if you want good grades

I loved his class. The material are dry and there is a lot of readings but if you like the subject like I did, you will enjoy the class and for sure can learn a lot. I think he is fair  , interesting and great ! doesn't have power points but its better to take as much notes as you can. Be sure to stick to his syllabus described requirements !
